verbose_text: Chiral 8-aminotetrahydroquinolines were previously synthesized and studied in our research group as ligands in metal complexes and were used as catalysts in the asymmetric transfer hydrogenation (ATH) of different ketones with good results.8 In the case of ligand L1, reduction to the corresponding amine did not proceed in the presence of different amounts of NaBH 4 or by using Pd/C (1, 5, or 10% molar equivalents) under a H 2 atmosphere pressure, probably because of the extensive double-bond conjugation of the substrate.
